name: Death City (itch)
description:
"My life isn't currency, YOURS IS!" - Mayor of Death City

DeathCity is a city builder style game where its population is the currency. Want to build a new house? That's gonna cost an arm and a leg literally... Maybe even a few.

To keep your "lovely" citizens alive happy you need to keep up with supply and demand. Each building has a set size (didn't have time for tooltips sorry!) that is based on it's price. The bigger the building the bigger the size.

To earn more population each building is "taxed". If there's not enough population for that building it won't be taxed though so beware!

Once your population hits 0 it's game over. Good luck!
